attributes.action: Greatly raise the funding for stem cell translation programmes of work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is a world leader on stem cell research and we are at risk of not gaining the health and financial benefits from translating this research to application in the clinic e.g The London Project - A Cure for Blindness is almost totally being funded from non-UK sources

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to greatly raise the funding for stem cell translation programmes of work.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=stemcellcures


Her Majesty's Government
